My Projects

Rest API

Building RESTful APIs using Spring Boot. This framework streamlines the development process, allowing me to create robust backend services. I can leverage Spring Data JPA for seamless database integration and utilize Swagger to generate interactive API documentation, making my APIs user-friendly and easily understandable for developers.

  • Spring Boot
  • MySQL
  • Swagger

Unified Absence Management Platform

The project offers a seamless attendance management system by combining a mobile app for real-time authentication, Google Apps Script for automated data recording, and a dynamic web platform for attendance monitoring and analysis. This integrated approach enhances the experience for students and educators alike, providing efficient attendance tracking and insightful data for informed decision-making in educational institutions.

  • Google apps srcipt
  • java
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript

Movies App

It's a React Native mobile app that lets users search for movies and find nearby cinemas. It uses the TMDb API to fetch movie data and the Google Places API to locate cinemas. Users can enter movie search queries and view movie details, including trailers. They can also search for cinemas near their location and view them on a map.

  • React Native
 {/*

SmartCorners - Real Estate Properties Site

This real estate site displays land properties and helps buyers and sellers. Buyers can see lots of pictures, videos, and details about properties before visiting in person. It makes it easier for buyers to find what they want and helps sellers get more attention.

  • Wordpress
 */}

Android Quiz App

The project consists of an interactive and educational quiz application designed specifically for Android devices.

  • java
  • Firebase

Covid Tracker

CovidTracker is a cross-platform mobile application developed using Flutter and Firebase, designed to help users track potential exposure to COVID-19. By leveraging Google Maps for geolocation services, the app allows users to input their recent locations and receive notifications if they have been in close proximity to someone who later tests positive for the virus.

  • FLutter
  • Firebase
  • Google Maps API
 {/*

Mitul Industries - Manufacturing Industries Site

This manufacturing industry website shows off products and helps the business get more customers and information online. Making products is important but making money from them is the goal. This site can help the business make more profit.

  • Wordpress
 */}

Fashion Cube-Ecommerce Application

  • React Js
